title: ralph-secrets list and search commands
description: Add commands to view and search secrets in 1Password. Show organized tree view of project/service structure. Enable searching across projects or within current project.

acceptanceCriteria.text: ralph-secrets list shows tree view: project → service → keys
ralph-secrets list --project <name> filters to one project
ralph-secrets list --service <name> filters to one service (e.g., --service anthropic)
ralph-secrets search <query> finds items matching query
Tree view uses box-drawing characters for clean output
Show count: 'X secrets in Y projects across Z services'
